title: Perseus rover
text: We are currently working on our second rover Perseus. After learning from what worked and what didn't on our last rover we are working towards a more robust and capable rover.

title: 2024 Competition
text: Since the teams formation in 2021 we have performed very well at the Australian Rover Challenge and look forwards to competing again.

title: Meet the Team
text: Our team is constantly growing and changing. Making improvements to Perseus requirs a range of technical skills and good ideas from our team.
